headline: Does not pay employees
pros: Location is near Grand Central Terminal.
cons: Started out promising, Miller Tabak had a strong name in options and a decent name in equity research. Then they stopped paying bonuses. And then they stopped paying salaries.

headline: Great place to work!
pros: Great learning environment and laid back work place.
cons: I have no cons it was a great experience for my first internship

headline: Sales & Trading
pros: Entrepreneurial, wear lots of different hats, own schedule, pay for E&T, benefits
cons: Not well run, mngt does not think strategically or broad mindedly

headline: They Don't Pay Employees
pros: It was once a mid-level sell side firm with a good options business.  Mismanagement following the 2008 crisis, however, left it in shambles.
cons: There is nothing left at this firm today.  They stopped paying staff regularly a while ago and anybody worth their salt left.  They lie to staff about being paid constantly.
